name: Jealousy's Hold
description: Hello! This is my first working visual novel! I plan to expand on it, but for now, im lazy, anyways, *ahem* "Your out at a public park, its such a nice day out! Then you hear someone sniffling, You go up to them, and he looks so down! You eentually find out his name is Lief, now, you decide how your journey goes.." Also i was gonna do i think were you can pick your name buut, it was glitching, so for now, your Emma, ill try to get the custom name working though! And also, I was to lazy to add bgm so, you should probably listen to something at the same time.. heh.. Also dont be afraid to comment! I appreciate kind words/constructive critism! Keep in mind to, I am a minor, so NO nsfw, it makes me uncomfy. Also I only know how it works on windows, so it might not work on Linux or Mac.
